description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for the provision of Synology and Seagate Hardware Products. Security requirement: This solicitation does not contain a requirement for vendor and personnel security screening. The requirement is subject to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
full_summary:
### Synology and Seagate Hardware Products Tender Announcement

#### Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00021767:T
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM018130/21767
* **Publication Date:** February 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

#### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Goods and Services

* **Contracting Authority:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)
* **Goods and Services Bid On:** Synology and Seagate Hardware Products
* **Security Requirement:** No vendor or personnel security screening required
* **Trade Agreements:** Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **Point of Contact:** Eric Lavigne
* **Email:** [eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 343-541-8756
* **Fax:** 613-960-6026
* **Address:** 180 Kent Ottawa, K1J 4A8, Canada

#### Notice and Solicitation Documents

* **Notice URL:** N/A
* **Attachment:** 
  + [download link 1](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/834A205A-1A15-4B40-BBF3-E14984670569)
  + [download link 2](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9D93EF7E-CFA1-4D39-955A-5134AFB5B652)

#### Additional Information

* **Bidder Inquiries:** Submit emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Link to P2P Portal to Access BPM Solicitation:** [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)
